content: JOIN THE EXCLUSIVE COMMUNITY EPL Contest!If you are a regular in sports betting, why don’t you take the chance to win 1 mBTC? Join Nitrobetting and follow the next to have the chance to win 1 mBTC.The rules are pretty much simple.Must have placed 1 bet worth a minimum of 0.0002 BTC in any of the English Premier League matches from the 5th Match day.Share your bet slip screenshot here.Your bet must have an odd of 1.4 or above.No alt account allowed.The winner will be picked by- https://bitcoindata.science/giveaway-manager/1 mBTC will be credited to your BTC address.Posting format-Code:Nitrobetting Userid:Segwit BTC address: Your betslip screenshot:

comments.body: Quote from: Woodie on September 16, 2023, 09:34:00 AMWhat does from the 5th match day mean here 5th Round in EPL.There are 38 match days (round) in EPL. Today/tomorrow is the 5th match day. In other words, matches this week in EPL.
